1.1.name: wordpress/youtube-sidebar
1.1.description: Display YouTube videos on individual pages. Let them list on a page, category view or front page or switch them off. You can even let AdSense show when a post doesnt have a video. There are interfaces for managing vidoes so you don't need to open posts all the time. There is always more to come, please contact me if you would like any changes made to the plugin.
